content:
This PR adds some API lemmas for multiplicative characters (and on the way deals with two porting notes). This is material that will be needed for results on Jacobi sums that I am planning to eventually add to Mathlib (see this repo). It would be nice to get some :eyes: !

The next step is to move NumberTheory.LegendreSymbol.MulCharacter to Algebra.Group.MulChar.Basic (there is already Algebra.Group.AddChar) and to add a file Algebra.Group.MulChar.Lemmas with more API lemmas that need heavier imports. (If you have objections to this, please say so here.)
What are you planning on putting in Algebra.Group.MulChar.Lemmas? The rules now are that anything under Algebra.Group musn't import any order theory nor MonoidWithZero
Then the move is not possible, as MonoidWithZero is necessary for the definition. Then the better alternative is probably to have a MulChar directory under NumberTheory instead of Algebra.Group?
Sure, or Algebra.MulChar or Algebra.GroupWithZero.MulChar if you consider that MulChar is basic enough to have other uses outside of number theory (that's what happened to AddChar after all).
I think I'll stick with NumberTheory for the time being.
